resources.string: You are a season adventurer, not quite a renown hero yet but you have completed a few big quests and your name is on the rise. Your exploits have attracted the attention of the Kane who is eager to employ you. That is a critical quest that he believes only you can accomplish. The kingdom of gray Ma has engaged in secret negotiations with a wholly principality of adventurer to form an alliance against the forces of the doomed lich Richard Lichard. Your mission is to guard the envoy who is tasked to deliver a sensitive document to out Vera. Three days have passed since you had accepted the quest and you has been watching over the envoy from a distance. The morning of the fourth day you are awakened by screams and a sound of metal crashing in a distance. The envoy s wagon is under attack. But by who? Now you need to choose what you re going to do next.
By staying back, you can study the scene carefully from the distance. You have learned that the envoy is being attacked by a band of orcs & goblins. How are you going to deal with this problem?
You have chosen to deal with the problem using magic. What kind of magic?
You have chosen to clever tactics to overcome them. What s your plan?
You have chosen to rally the guards. How exactly are you going to achieve this?
After approaching the scene, you discovered that the envoy is being attacked by a band of orcs & goblins. How are you going to save them?
You have chosen to charge at the enemy. What gives you this confidence?
You have chosen to stand and fight. You can fight close range or long range, but how exactly are you going to achieve this?
You have chosen to assist the guards. How exactly are you going to achieve this?

Have you ever fantasized about this question. If you are flung into the dungeons and dragons world of fame where holders lurk underground labyrinths and dragons rule the skies above. How would your story be told.
This app was made based on "Don't Stop Thinking" youtube videos with the rightful permissions
